import React, { useLayoutEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import Konten from "./Konten"; function AddPost ({ addPost }){ const textbox = useRef(null); function adjustHeight() { textbox.current.style.height = "inherit"; textbox.current.style.height = `${textbox.current.scrollHeight}px`; } useLayoutEffect(adjustHeight, []); function handleKeyDown(e) { adjustHeight(); } const handleChange = (e) => { handleKeyDown(e); setPost(e.target.value); } const [input, setInput] = useState(''); const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); const [post, setPost] = useState([]); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (formValidation()) { acceptData(); } }; const formValidation = () => { if (input.trim() === '') { setMessage('Post cannot be blank'); return false; } else { setMessage(''); return true; } }; const acceptData = () => { const newPost = { text: input }; setPost([...post, newPost]); setInput(''); }; return (
